body_html:
I agree except that if I run with only KL loss and comment out BCE loss it also works.
So basically:

KL  #ok
BCE #ok
0*KL + BCE #nope
KL + 0*BCE #nope

In addition there is that reparametrization part (i.e. before I re-write that part of the code into an equivalent format, it didn't run).

body:
I agree except that if I run with only KL loss and comment out BCE loss it also works.
So basically:
```
KL  #ok
BCE #ok
0*KL + BCE #nope
KL + 0*BCE #nope
```

In addition there is that reparametrization part (i.e. before I re-write that part of the code into an equivalent format, it didn't run).
